name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Network Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in **network virtualization**, **network automation**, **network security**, and **LAN/WLAN** infrastructures. Proven skills in **Cisco**, **HPE Aruba**, **Dell EMC**, and **Extreme Networks** technologies. Strong project management abilities and a customer-oriented approach, fostering team collaboration to drive successful project outcomes. Experienced in implementing network segmentation strategies to enhance system security and performance. Fluent in German (C1) and proficient in English (B2). Original strengths include delivering high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors, with a robust foundation in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Additionally, well-versed in building AI/ML-powered platforms and cloud-native systems using **AWS** and **Azure**.

Designed and maintained **network virtualization** and **network automation** strategies, optimizing resource utilization and significantly reducing operational costs by **15%** over six months.
Ensured robust **network security** measures through the implementation of **NAC** (Network Access Control) and **segmentation** techniques, successfully protecting sensitive data and achieving a 99.9% uptime.
Led project management initiatives to deploy network upgrades across multiple sites, achieving project completion ***3 weeks*** ahead of schedule, while ensuring customer satisfaction and adherence to guidelines.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to enhance ***network infrastructure*** and compliance with industry standards, fostering a culture of teamwork and continuous improvement.
Provided guidance and training to junior engineers, promoting knowledge transfer and enhancing team capabilities in **network security** and automation tools.
Rendered customer orientation and support through regular feedback loops, significantly improving service quality and enhancing customer retention rates by ***20%***.
Utilized German (C1) and English (B2) language skills to effectively communicate with international teams and clients, facilitating smooth project execution and stakeholder engagement.
